header.title: Avylia
header.subtitle: An empathic conversation experience with Artificial Intelligence.

home.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout from Avylia?

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: Avylia AI is a virtual assistant for informational and empathetic listening purposes. It does not replace professional care from psychologists, therapists, or psychiatrists. If you are going through a difficult time, please seek specialized medical help.

chat.warning: Avylia AI may make mistakes. Please verify information and consult a specialist when needed.

sidebar.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? This action cannot be undone.

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters.
validation.passwordUpper: Password must contain an uppercase letter.
validation.passwordLower: Password must contain a lowercase letter.
validation.passwordSymbol: Password must contain a special character.

plansPage.title: Choose your plan
plansPage.subtitle: Tokens to use Avylia AI however you want
plansPage.loginRequired: You need to be logged in to purchase.
plansPage.benefitsTitle: Why upgrade to the Pro plan?

benefits.breathingDesc: Practice breathing techniques with a calm voice and ambient music to ease anxiety.
benefits.journalDesc: Track how you feel over time with visual charts and emotional insights.
benefits.chatDesc: Talk with quicker, more empathetic, and emotionally deeper responses.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: Welcome to Avylia AI. By using our services, you agree to the following terms of use. Please read carefully before proceeding.
terms.noMedical: Avylia AI is a virtual assistant focused on emotional support and guided reflections. We do not provide medical diagnoses or replace mental health professionals.
terms.privacy: All interactions may be recorded for continuous improvement purposes, respecting your privacy according to our Privacy Policy.
terms.agreement: Using the service implies full acceptance of these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use Avylia AI.
terms.changes: We reserve the right to update the terms at any time. Check this page periodically to stay informed about changes.

free.title: Free Plan
free.description: Ideal for those who want to try with limited features.

pro.title: Pro Plan
pro.description: Full access, faster responses, and priority support.

plans.thanks-for-the-suport: Thank you for supporting the project!

about.title: About the Creator
about.description: Hi! My name is Rhaniery Mueller, founder of Mueller Solutions. With years of experience as a fullstack developer, I created Avylia AI to bring technology and mental well-being closer together. I believe in the power of digital empathy and the potential of voice assistants to make emotional care more accessible to everyone.

motivational.title: Motivational Quote
motivational.heading: Spin to get your daily inspiration!
motivational.description: Click the button below and receive a positive and inspiring quote generated by AI.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions, suggestions, or need help? Get in touch with us!
contact.name: Your name
contact.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully!
contact.errorMessage: Oops! Something went wrong. Try again later.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This policy explains how Avylia AI collects, uses, and protects your personal data.
privacy.dataCollection: We collect information such as name, email, and chat interactions to provide a personalized experience.
privacy.dataUse: Data is used exclusively for authentication, personalization, and to improve the AI experience.
privacy.sharing: We do not share your data with third parties, except for essential services like AI providers (e.g., OpenAI) and hosting platforms.
privacy.security: We apply technical and organizational measures to protect your data. No system is 100% secure, but we strive to mitigate risks as much as possible.
privacy.rights: You may request the deletion of your data at any time by contacting suporte@avylia.com.
